CRIoT¶

template<typename K, class V>
class CRIoT_Control_VO¶

Public Functions

CRIoT_Control_VO(vector<K> &pks, vector<K> &nks, float lf = 0.95, float othello_ratio = 1)¶

Constructor for CRIoT Control VO

Parameters

  • pks: A vector of positive keys

  • nks: A vector of negative keys

  • lf: Load factor

  • othello_ratio: Othello Ratio

void init(vector<K> &pks, vector<K> &nks, float lf = 0.95, float othello_ratio = 1)¶

Alternate constructor for CRIoT Control VO

Parameters

  • pks: A vector of positive keys

  • nks: A vector of negative keys

  • lf: Load factor

  • othello_ratio: Othello Ratio

vector<vector<uint8_t>> encode_full()¶

Encodes the data plane CRC as string arrays.

Return

The encoded bytes

vector<uint8_t> encode_summary(pair<K, V> kv, uint8_t action)¶

Encodes the summary for sending Parts are encoded in this order: the type of action, key, value, flipped_indexes size, flipped indexes. type of action can be add(0), remove(1), unrevoke(2), revoke(3)

Return

The encoded summary of bytes.

Parameters

  • kv: The key value pair that the action is done to.

  • action: The action done.

bool insert(pair<K, V> kv)¶

Inserts a key value pair into the structure.

Return

bool Indicating if the insert succeded without rebuild.

Parameters

  • kv: The key value pair to be inserted.

bool batch_insert(std::vector<pair<K, V>> kv_pairs)¶

Inserts key value pairs in a batch.

Return

If the structure needed to be rebuilt.

Parameters

  • kv_pairs: A vector of key value pairs to be inserted

bool setValue(pair<K, V> kv)¶

Flips a key value pair in the structure.

Return

bool Indicating if the flip succeded without rebuild.

Parameters

  • kv: The key value pair to be flipped.

void erase(K k)¶

Erases a key from the structure. TODO: IMPLEMENT

Parameters

  • k: The key to be erased.

V query(K key)¶

Queries the value of the key.

Return

The value of the key.

Parameters

  • key: The key to be queried.

template<typename K, class V>
class CRIoT_Data_VO¶

Public Functions

void decode_full(vector<uint8_t> &s)¶

Decodes the full update received.

Parameters

  • s: The data received from the server

void decode_summary(vector<uint8_t> summary)¶

Decodes the summary Parts are decoded in this order: the type of action, key, value, flipped_indexes size, flipped indexes. type of action can be add(0), remove(1), unrevoke(2), revoke(3)

Parameters

  • summary: The vector of bytes of summary.

V query(const K key)¶

Queries a key from the structure.

Return

The value associated with the key.

Parameters

  • key: Key to be queried.

vector<V> batch_query(const vector<K> keys)¶

Queries keys in a batch

Return

Values of the keys queried

Parameters

  • keys: Keys to be queried

void insert(pair<K, V> kv, vector<uint32_t> &flipped_indexes)¶

Inserts a key with a value.

Parameters

  • kv: Key value pair to be inserted.

  • flipped_indexes: The vector of flipped indexes received.

Sets a value.

Parameters

  • flipped_indexes: The vector of flipped indexes received.
